short_summary: This notice is for the maintenance, repair, modification, rebuilding and installation of equipment related to ships in Cacagne, New Brunswick
description: The contractor will be responsible for the placement, lifting, removal, maintenance, and servicing of buoys in Cacagne, New Brunswick. The contract duration is from 2023-07-03 to 2025-07-02.
tags: maintenance repair modification rebilding installation of equipment related to ships
full_summary:
================
### Tender Announcement: Buoy Services - New Brunswick

#### Reference Number
PW-23-01029171

#### Solicitation Number
30003442

#### Tender Status
Expired

#### Description
The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) Canada is seeking a contractor to provide buoy services in Cacagne, New Brunswick. The successful bidder will be responsible for placing, lifting, removing, maintaining, and servicing of buoys within a contract period of approximately two years.

#### Contract Details
* Contract Start Date: July 3, 2023
* Contract End Date: July 2, 2025
* Time frame for delivery: July 3, 2023 to July 2, 2025

#### Tender Documents
The tender documents, including the Request for Proposal (RFP) and accompanying attachments, are available for download on the Canada Buys website:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/6fb207d38e4ca330bb0dec42eed18eb0/pr_30003442_-_rfp_-_buoy_services_-_cocagne-nb_english.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/1e4075abed903cf290598231766514f8/pr_30003442_-_rfp_-_buoy_services_-_cocagne-nb_french.pdf

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Gordon, John
DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca

#### Trade Agreements
This tender opportunity is open to bidders under the following trade agreements:
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)  ripe to our terms and cannot be recreated. Let me know if you need further assistance! markdown
